portfolio.crudCategories: Add, Edit, and Delete Content Categories
portfolio.enterNewCategory: Enter the new category name and click Add
portfolio.categoryList: A list of all available categories with options to edit and delete
portfolio.selectCategory: Select the appropriate category, then upload the files (multiple allowed)
portfolio.dragTheFile: Drag the file here or click to select
portfolio.maxLength: Maximum size: 10MB per file | Multiple files can be selected
portfolio.selectValidFile: Please select a valid image or video file
portfolio.fileBig: The file size is too large. Maximum allowed is 10MB
portfolio.pleaseSelectFile: Please select a category and files
portfolio.wrongUpload: An error occurred while uploading file number
portfolio.uploadPhotosVideos: Upload your photos and videos and organize them into the appropriate categories
portfolio.selectCategoryAndUpload: Select the appropriate category, then upload the files (multiple allowed)
portfolio.noCategoriesAvailable: No categories available. Please add a category first from the top.
portfolio.noFilesUploaded: No files have been uploaded yet
portfolio.deleteConfirmation: Are you sure you want to delete this file? This action cannot be undone
portfolio.startAdd: Start by adding your first category
portfolio.deleteCategoryConfirmation: Are you sure you want to delete the category "{name}"? This action cannot be undone.
portfolio.deleteCategoryFailed: Cannot delete this category because it has linked media files.
portfolio.deleteCategoryError: An error occurred while deleting the category.

brand.description: Add and manage brands for your categories
brand.selectCategory: Select a category and enter brand information in both languages
brand.manageBrand: Manage brands in the selected category
brand.noBrand: No brands found in this category
